mapper.sql: log_id, description, log_type, `method`, params, request_ip, `time`, username, address, browser, exception_detail, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_log (description, log_type, `method`, params, request_ip, `time`, username, address, browser, exception_detail, create_time) values
(#{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into t_log
log_id,
description, log_type, `method`, params, request_ip, `time`, username, address, browser, exception_detail, create_time,
values
#{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
on duplicate key update
log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception_detail = #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

log_id,
description,
log_type,
`method`,
params,
request_ip,
`time`,
username,
address,
browser,
exception_detail,

values

log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
